Row.Text: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +4 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production per Age. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Rough and Mountain Terrain in this Settlement.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Rough and Mountain Terrain in this Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age. Volcano tiles.

+4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production per Age. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age, every time a Natural Disaster has provided Fertility this Age to you.
+1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age, every time a Natural Disaster has provided Fertility this Age to you.
+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production,[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to adjacent Rural tiles.
Shiva is signless, without color, taste, smell, that is beyond word or touch, without quality, motionless and changeless.
In an enchanted world, the sun bumps her head on Fuji's peak.
The earth is held fast by mountains, so that it does not sway upon the waters.
O Pachacamac! Art thou in the sky or upon the earth? In the clouds or in the deeps?
